parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'id': 2, 'title': '充值成功，小数', 'method': 'post', 'url': 'member/recharge', 'request_data': '{"member_id":#member_id#,"amount":2000.5}', 'except': '{"code": 0, "msg": "OK", "data": {"id": #member_id#, "leave_amount": #money#}}', 'check_sql': 'SELECT CAST(member.leave_amount AS CHAR) as leave_amount  from futureloan.member where id = #member_id# '}
